translations: 自私自利；自我中心；任性

sentences.sentence: Love is the antithesis of selfishness.
We must be mindful of the consequences of selfishness.
sentences.translation: 我们一定要留意自私自利的后果。

sentences.sentence: We've all been guilty of selfishness at some time in our lives.
sentences.translation: 我们每个人一生中都有过自私自利的过失。
